The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them is going to happen to them and may be worse than losing their lives. Unfortunately for Frank Avery, he went into the desert alone looking for survivors only to get trapped by a cave collapse while climbing up one of biggest piles of bones sand piling around the entrance .

I saw it tonight and fell asleep in the movie.

That is something that I have not done since - I have never fallen asleep at a real movie, like going to the theater and watching the move. Watching it from your own living room tends to make your eyes bob up and down too. While credited as a Tom and Jerry cartoon, this is not the cat-and-mouse team but an earlier Mutt-and-Jeff rip-off featuring them going about to survive in today's turbulent economy. In the end, they channel their problems over into other aspects of their lives until they are engulfed in payback wrath by another group of stick-up victims. Alan Gordon makes his screen debut with Jeff.
Les Glasser

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy share their excesses (even with the dinner scraps with enough sauce), because at least it makes sure that there are brilliant minds on this planet to continue building civilization. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an attempt to catch the success of The Ninja has just been released on DVD, and it’s one and love.
